title: Scholarship portal to timely resolve complaints of students: PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 18 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan Friday said Scholarship Complaint Portal will ensure coordinated and timely resolution of students complaints.
In a tweet on social media platform Twitter, he said, “Yesterday we launched a dedicated Scholarship Complaint Portal under umbrella of PM Portal.”
“This will ensure coordinated and timely resolution of students complaints. During CFY 2.6 mn scholarships are being awarded to talented & deserving students across Pak amounting to Rs. 28.3bn,” he added.
